section.title: Synopsis
section.codeblock: DROP MATERIALIZED VIEW [ IF EXISTS ] name [, ...] [ CASCADE | RESTRICT ]

body.section: DescriptionDROP MATERIALIZED VIEW drops an existing materialized view. To execute this command, you must be the owner of the materialized view.

plentry.pd: Do not throw an error if the materialized view does not exist. A notice is issued in this case.
The name (optionally schema-qualified) of a materialized view to be dropped.
Automatically drop objects that depend on the materialized view (such as other materialized views, or regular views).

pd.p: Refuse to drop the materialized view if any objects depend on it. This is the default.

section.title: Examples
section.p: This command removes the materialized view called order_summary.

section.title: Compatibility
section.p: DROP MATERIALIZED VIEW is a Greenplum Database extension of the SQL standard.
